page.title: 05FARMING IN THE FUTURE
page.content: {THE FUTURE FOOD PRODUCTION IN THE AREA {______________________________________ At the present time there is surplus production of many types of food grown in this area such as Wheat and Potatoes. It is likely that there will be a limit to the future increase of these crops and possibly even a reduction. If this is the case then the land currently used for growing these crops will need to be used for other things. In this part of the country the land is too valuable and fertile to be left fallow and so there is likely to be a search for new types of food crops to fill the gap caused. It is not foreseen that the land in our area will be used for any purpose other than agriculture. It is one of the most fertile areas of the country.
